entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:04 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 12:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.8°C
Pressure: 98.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: SW 32 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries and snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 12:27 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
